No. The point is to cooperate our effort.

Think about this war situation:
When our infantry moves into a town to take over it, while our artillery fire on the town. Our infantry will be killed by our artillery and we will fail to take the town. So when our infantry moves into a town, we must stop our artillery.

Today, someone called for a 3 million people march. My understanding is that this massive march demonstrates (to the Government and the whole world) that Hong Kongers will not be afraid by the Emergence Law and we will still come out to protest. However, the 勇武 destroys our march in three ways (just like the artillery kills our infantry in the above example):

1. The 勇武 set up the road blocks too early so that a lot of us failed to reach the starting place early enough.
2. Some和理非 think that the勇武 has kidnapped the 和理非 march, and hence, destroy the purpose of this massive march.
3. The 勇武 has destroyed some 和理非. I have pointed out that a lot of 和理非 have to carry babies to the march on 18 August because they cannot leave the babies alone at home, so 勇武 should not take any actions. However, some 勇武 insisted to take violent actions on that day. This forces some 和理非 stayed at home on 18 August.

I would like to remind the 勇武 that you should not take violent actions every time you come out. Think about this military fact:

Tanks are more powerful than rifle guns, but all army in the world has both tanks and rifle guns because both of them have their own merits.

Therefore, we should not take 勇武 actions in a massive march. When the 和理非 has a massive march in one location, and the 勇武 should take actions in other location. Using my first example, when the infantry moves into Town A, the artillery should fire on Town B.

[長文][召喚全世界] 嘈完就入黎 睇下下一步應該做咩
https://lih.kg/1630553
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

replies.msg:
代友回覆：

(利申: 和理非)

感謝樓主講出了現時的戰略問題，雖然之前都有巴打出過文提醒過切勿留戀街頭的建議，但每次見到有勇武派被捉，我等是何等心痛
引用番樓主的數據

被捕人數比較
和理非大遊行之後進攻：
929 >100人
106 >50人

遍地開花：
102 = 1人
103 = 3人

用多點道理支持一下樓主和理非回合勇武派隱住別出手。

1. 外媒最喜歡睇到極度反差的場面
現在要得到外國支持，一定要呈現出一個極和平(遊行)和極暴力(POPO)的場面，就算立了蒙面法，只要人多，POPO就難出手，就算出手大舉捉人或開TG，這些反差場面是外媒的最愛，亦顯得出港共政府和POPO的殘暴。勇武派於大遊行請結合和理非行動，人多POPO一定難出手。

2.人多難BE WATER
每次大遊行之後勇武派出手，都多是損兵折將，何解，因為人多!!就好似今日銅鑼灣有10個手捉在鵝頸橋被捉，是因為人太多，前方沒有去路被捉。

3. 切勿迷戀街頭
對不起，這可能引出勇武派不滿。但我想指出所謂防守路障是多餘的，請問大家所手持的雨傘或炎魔法真的擋到POPO進攻嗎?? 砌完路障就要走，別逗留送人頭。跟和理非一齊走。

4.不要堵路，要製造塞車
如果是繁忙時間，不要堵路，要製造交通阻塞。例如在多個路口設路障，切記不要全BLOCK，只三線行車砌路障BLOCK 1.5條或2條線，令到車輛仍然可以在路面行走。製造掩護令POPO難以運兵，就算POPO到現場要推進，都難以在全清空的路面上推進。
另外如果POPO選擇在車多路面上開TG，都令人覺得POPO置市民於不顧。 (配合第三點，希望勇武派砌完路障就要離開)

5. 文宣組和校巴組都到極限
文宣組和校巴組都到極限。

6. 減少遠征，遍地開花
減少遠征，在港島或九龍大型行動，現在沒黨鐵，勇武派應該以18區快閃為主，由和理非街坊掩護下進行攻勢下離開或上樓回家。就算落單被捉，無裝備無危險物品POPO要舉證都難以入罪。

7. 縮短在街頭時間
長時間的街頭遊走令被捕機會大增，尤其POPO糧餉充足，此消彼長，在市民繁忙時間離開，可以減少被捕風險和校巴需求。

8. 增加POPO企街時間
其實這一點可能大家會留意到，，每逢晚上6-8都是POPO放飯時間，亦都大家半場的休息時間，敵疲我打，敵進我退才是兵法之道。PoPo要長時間穿成人尿片當班的，只要增得Popo的企街時間，就令他們更加痛苦。

9. 減少使用炎系，改用臭系或漆系屬性攻擊
尤其是遍地開花場合，只要由高處突擊臭系或漆系，配合第8點的增加PoPo罰企街時間，增加對方的精神損害。

10. 減少破壞黨鐵、商鋪
就算大家有幾多怒氣都好，繼續破壞會引起其他人反感，文宣更加難拆。記住要打造我方是人義之師，PoPo是惡毒皇軍形象。

11. 等林奠DQ區議會或參選人
不要再攻擊敵對政黨辦事處(何妖除外)，只會增加林奠再用緊急法去打壓民主選舉的口實，相反，結果沒事發生，DQ了區議會選舉就是林莫理虧，無論在外在內，我方更加出師有名。

When our infantry moves into a town to take over it, while our artillery fire on the town. Our infantry will be killed by our artillery and we will fail to take the town. So when our infantry moves into a town, we must stop our artillery.

Today, someone called for a 3 million people march. My understanding is that this massive march demonstrates (to the Government and the whole world) that Hong Kongers will not be afraid by the Emergence Law and we will still come out to protest. However, the 勇武 destroys our march in three ways (just like the artillery kills our infantry in the above example):

1. The 勇武 set up the road blocks too early so that a lot of us failed to reach the starting place early enough.
2. Some和理非 think that the勇武 has kidnapped the 和理非 march, and hence, destroy the purpose of this massive march.
3. The 勇武 has destroyed some 和理非. I have pointed out that a lot of 和理非 have to carry babies to the march on 18 August because they cannot leave the babies alone at home, so 勇武 should not take any actions. However, some 勇武 insisted to take violent actions on that day. This forces some 和理非 stayed at home on 18 August.

I would like to remind the 勇武 that you should not take violent actions every time you come out. Think about this military fact:

Tanks are more powerful than rifle guns, but all army in the world has both tanks and rifle guns because both of them have their own merits.

Therefore, we should not take 勇武 actions in a massive march. When the 和理非 has a massive march in one location, and the 勇武 should take actions in other location. Using my first example, when the infantry moves into Town A, the artillery should fire on Town B.
